    Fields in gameComponents declared as Player 
    Modifier and Type Field Description

    firstPlayer is the player ideally inserted first in the match.
    private Player Match.secondPlayer
    secondPlayer is the player ideally inserted second in the match.

    Methods in gameGUI with parameters of type Player 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void GUI.setColorCorrespondingToButton​(javax.swing.JButton colorButton, Player player)
    Sets player's token to the color of the chosen button In order to shorten the code, this method is also concerned with setting visibility of elements in the biggestFrame JFrame (biggestFrame is the main frame of the application).
    void GUI.showColorGrid​(Player p)
    Show the interface from which a player can choose a color for his token.

    Methods in saveAndLoad with parameters of type Player

    Method used to load the board from the given file, fileName.
    private static void SaveMatch.savePlayer​(Player player, java.io.File savingFile, boolean isFirstPlayer, boolean toBeAppended)
    Private method for storing player name and player's token color in the file savingFile In order to make it user readable, in the file is written a short description of the next data, like "First player: ", and then the data themselves.
